name: Random Dice: Wars
description:
This is just the beginning of a whole new Dice War!
Make your own build and destroy the enemy tower!
Merge and upgrade the random dice! The powerful Guardian will lead you to the victory!




■ Real Time Battle! [1v1 PvP Battle]
- Play live match and out-strategize the opponent!
- Make a unique build and show off your strategy!
- Win in battles, collect Trophies and reach high rank!



■ Enjoy with Friend! [2v2 Team Battle]
- Pair up with friend and destroy the enemy tower!
- Open the chests with the Keys earned and collect special rewards!
- Collect Legendary Dice from Glorious Chest!



■ Collect Various Dice & Guardians!
- Collect up to 30 various kinds of Dice & Guardians!
- Upgrade the Dice & Guardians and strengthen your army!


■ New Season, New Rank! [Season System for Random Dice: Wars!!]
- Earn Trophies throughout the fierce battles and achieve the rank you aim for!
- Level up with the Trophies and collect sweet rewards!




# User
- Customer Center Reception: [Game Run] - [Settings] - [Customer Support]





OS 10.0 or above recommended.


Requires the following permissions for customer support functionality (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE).




Terms of Service - https://111percent.net/games/randomwars/termsofservice-en.html
Privacy Policy - https://111percent.net/games/randomwars/privacy-en.html



Support - Settings > Customer Support | support@111percent.mail.helpshift.com


Let us take you to 111% with this adrenaline rush royale warfare!
